plot: An analyst's day has been a nightmare and he is dead set on drowning himself with whiskey and kissing his life "goodbye", until he meets a bartender whose own tale makes his look like a cake walk.
title: The Analyst's Goodbye
plot_es: An analyst's day has been a nightmare and he is dead set on drowning himself with whiskey and kissing his life "goodbye", until he meets a bartender whose own tale makes his look like a cake walk.
plot_en: An analyst's day has been a nightmare and he is dead set on drowning himself with whiskey and kissing his life "goodbye", until he meets a bartender whose own tale makes his look like a cake walk.
